page.title: 16Buses. Fordham to Burwell.
page.content: There are 8 buses a day going from Fordham to Burwell. The first one is at 08.01 and the last at 18.40. There are 10 buses going from Burwell to Fordham. The first is at 07.16 and the last at 18.55. There are not any real bus stops in our area but you can stand on the road and stick your hand out and the bus should stop. They use double deckers and single deckers. The double decker can hold 74 people and the single decker 53 people. The fare is 85p for adults and 43p for children. There were 9 people on the bus that left Burwell at 13.31: 3 teenagers, 4 ladies and 2 men. 3 people travelled on the bus every day. For one person it was the first time they had been on the bus. Most people got off at Fordham or Soham. They were going home from work or school.
